author: hsert
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds the first version of di-tau Phase2 HLT paths with charged and DeepTau isolation. The performance of triggers is not optimal yet. The current performance and also details for the paths can be seen in the following slides:

https://indico.cern.ch/event/1306042/contributions/5492549/attachments/2686771/4661683/Phase2_TauTriggerMeeting_hsert.pdf


#### PR validation:

The basic tests has been performed, suggested in the [CMSSW PR instructions](https://cms-sw.github.io/PRWorkflow.html)
- "scram b runtests" command gives the following output:
  Creating test log file logs/slc7_amd64_gcc11/testing.log
  Fail  115s ... HLTrigger/Configuration/testAccessToEDMInputsOfHLTTests
  >> Test sequence completed for CMSSW CMSSW_13_1_0_pre3
- runTheMatrix test workflow seems to be working fine.
title: DiTauHLTPhase2
